channel.title: memories on Decode
channel.description: Recent content in memories on Decode

item.title: Mallorca
item.description: Still at the airport of Mallorca. Delayed for more than 3 hours. Shouldnt say that the last delay was the longest. Skin was burned on the head, back and chest. Need time to heal. It turned out to be the longest delay I’ve ever experienced till now. We didn’t arrive at London till 3 am. Then we had to wait till 10am for the bus because that’s the earliest bus to my place (rail service was on strike that day).

item.title: Barcelona
item.description: @BCN Airport now. Flight delayed for more than 1 hour already. Still waiting. Wasted a whole afternoon here.
